newsitem.title: UK: Ecuador eyes $300 mln 5-yr debut Eurobond -dealers.
newsitem.headline: Ecuador eyes $300 mln 5-yr debut Eurobond -dealers.

text.p: Ecuador is eyeing a $300 million five-year Eurobond, syndicate officials away from the lead manager told Reuters on Thursday.
"The interest is good so its debut Eurobond should do well," a syndicate manager away from the lead said.
Following Wednesday's investor presentation in London, dealers said a spread of 350 to 450 basis points over U.S. Treasury notes was mooted.
A report from New York on Wednesday suggested the deal might be increased in size. Launch is expected around Thursday, April 17, dealers said.
Chase is lead manager of the transaction but declined to comment on the details of the issue.
The roadshow team also visits Geneva and Frankfurt as well as a number of cities in the U.S. including New York.
